data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lin, Xiaolong, Yao, Yuanyuan, Liu, Wenbin, Wang, Xinhua (2013): A review of the genus Compterosmittia Saether, 1981 (Diptera: Chironomidae) from China. Zootaxa 3669 (2): 129-138, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3669.2.3
